title: 93/513/EEC: Council Decision of 21 September 1993 amending Decision 88/408/EEC on the levels of the fees to be charged for health inspections and controls of fresh meat, pursuant to Directive 85/73/EEC
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 21 September 1993 amending Decision 88/408/EEC on the levels of the fees to be charged for health inspections and controls of fresh meat, pursuant to Directive 85/73/EEC
(93/513/EEC)THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 September 1993.
For the Council
The President
A. BOURGEOIS
(1) OJ No L 32, 5. 2. 1985, p. 14. Directive as last amended by Directive 88/409/EEC (OJ No L 1945, 22. 7. 1988, p. 28).
(2) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 24.
(3) OJ No C 325, 14. 12. 1991, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 62, 15. 3. 1993, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 69. Directive as amended by Directive 92/5/EEC (OJ No L 57, 2. 3. 1992, p. 1).
(6) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1. Directive as last amended by Directive 92/438/EEC (OJ No L 343, 25. 8. 1992, p. 27).
